alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 11:11AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Forest, eastern Oneida and north central Langlade Counties through NOON CDT... At 1110 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eagle River to 10 miles northwest of Crandon to near Pearson. These storms were nearly stationary. The stationary nature of these storms will make for localized heavy rainfall through noon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pearson and Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Veterans Memorial County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
